price: Inni (Rabbiin) Isa akka dukkanoowwan dachiifi bahraa keessa isaaniin qajeeltaniif urjiiwwan isiniif godhe sani. Dhugumatti, Nuti keeyyattoota ummata beekaniif addeessinee jirra.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلنُّجُومَ لِتَهۡتَدُواْ بِهَا فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-nujūma litahtadū bihā fī ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
